FuncDef: This command specifies the router ID to be used with this BGP instance.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the router ID, expressed as any non-zero value in the range 0.0.0.1 to 255.255.255.255 (or when converted to decimal it can have any value in the range 1-4294967295). It is recommended to use the system IPv4 address.
